title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.8 - Inspection of private rail crossings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.8 - Inspection of private rail crossings

State Regulations

The commissioner shall have the right, upon reasonable
notice to the real property owner, to enter in or upon private property to
inspect any private rail crossing site. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
919.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
